sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Once per session, when making a single check, the character may treat his Force rating as being equal to his ranks in Knowledge (Lore).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Knowledge is power</name> <number>TAL0001073</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 03:43:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6d4e5cf4db224c542901de90cf9619d7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 03:43:44</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
